title: OCE Support Main Looking for anyone to help me learn new support champs/Play better at supp

embed.description: Tisalovelybug / Silver 2 78LP / 59W 65L Win Ratio 48% / Rakan - 29W 43L Win Ratio 40%, Ahri - 7W 15L Win Ratio 32%, Warwick - 4W 6L Win Ratio 40%, Galio - 5W 3L Win Ratio 63%, Camille - 6W 1L Win Ratio 86%

body:
I only started playing earlier this year, I'm pretty much a Rakan one trick at this point but I really do wanna learn new champs (especially seeing as I've seen a lot more Rakan picks/bans since preseason started) {{champion:497}} {{champion:497}} {{champion:497}} 

I feel like I have improved a lot just in the past month, would love to improve more so I can go for gold in preseason/next season ranked! Just missed out this year on Silver 2.

Trying to pick up Lulu and Leona but looking for any champs that are similar to Rakan (not too squishy, perform some sick saves/engages etc.)

Just want some advice and help on becoming a better player really, I feel like I've improved a fair bit since I first started so want to keep doing so!

replies.body: Message me ign: newiey. Been playing this game since season 2.
i could teach you champs in aram, since i play aram only XD my ign is the same as my boards name
